author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Announcement Trailer for Witchspire, an upcoming open-world survival crafting game developed by Envar Games. Players can become acquainted with an enchanting world with customizable characters trapped in a mysterious world after accidentally activating the titular spire. Make use of upgradeable wands, trinkets, spells, and more to battle wild creatures and establish a safe base of operations for more adventures. Witchspire is launching into Early Access in 2026 for PC (Steam).

#Witchspire #Gaming #IGN

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
James Gunn has announced the next Superman film in the rebooted DCU: Man of Tomorrow. Gunn already has a treatment for the story written, and is expected to go into production in the very near future. Next up in the DCU theatrical schedule are Supergirl and Clayface, due out next year. In other news, Amazon Prime Video's Tomb Raider series has found its Lara Croft in Sophie Turner. The Tomb Raider series will be written and executive produced by Phoebe Waller-Bridge. And finally, the Perfect Dark reboot was almost saved at the last minute by Take-Two Interactive. Developer Crystal Dynamics was in discussions with Take-Two to handle publishing duties, but the deal ultimately fell through. Work on the game reportedly continued even after the game was officially canceled by Microsoft.

#IGN #Superman
title: James Gunn Announces Man of Tomorrow as the Next Superman Saga Film - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Join developer IO Interactive for a deep dive into 007: First Light and check out over 30 minutes of gameplay in this latest video for the upcoming espionage action-adventure game. In this gameplay playthrough video, take a look at Bond's first mission as an MI6 recruit. The video showcases high-speed car chases, on-foot stealth sequences, shootouts, and more. 


In 007 First Light, follow James Bond as a young, resourceful, and sometimes reckless recruit in MI6's training programme, and discover an origin story of the world’s most famous spy.


The gameplay footage at State of Play shows off the first mission James Bond embarks on as a new recruit to an expensive hotel in search of 009. After Bond picks up on a suspicious employee at the hotel, he makes his way into the building, making use of his excellent reconnaissance tactics to scan the area for the best way in. By utilizing tools such as matches and sleeping darts to distract guards, James Bond enters the hotel by using platfor
title: 007 First Light - Official Gameplay Deep Dive | State of Play 2025

In 007 First Light, follow James Bond as a young, resourceful and sometimes reckless recruit in MI6's training programme, and discover an origin story of the world’s most famous spy.

author: IGN
description:
Surviving Hell is Us isn’t easy. It throws you into a hostile world without maps, quest markers, or handholding. That means success comes down to how well you can explore, fight, and make the most of limited resources. Whether you’re just starting out or looking to sharpen your skills, these tips will help you get your bearings, stay alive, and uncover the many secrets hidden throughout this brutal adventure.

In this guide, we break down the most important survival strategies in Hell is Us, including how to use your compass for navigation, master the Healing Pulse system, upgrade weapons and defensive gear, harness Lymbic Abilities, and make the most of allies like Victor and Tania. You’ll also learn how to close timeloops, unlock blacksmith upgrades with forgebooks, and optimize drone skills to escape danger. If you want to get stronger, explore smarter, and progress faster, these tips and tricks will give you the edge you need to thrive in Hell is Us.

00:00 Intro
00:47 Exploration
title: 10 Tips You Need to Know Before Playing Hell is Us

author: IGN
description:
Step into the Rift. Macabre launches into Early Access on Steam, 29 September 2025 (PT).

Macabre is a co-op stealth extraction horror game from Australian indie team Weforge Studio. Trapped inside a collapsing time rift, you and your squad must scavenge, sneak, and survive against a relentless predator that learns from your every move.

Key Features:
Explore volatile procedural maps where environments and threats change every run.

Squad up with up to 4 players, or face the Rift alone in solo play.

Loot, scavenge, and extract rare resources before the Rift collapses.

Outsmart the Crawler, a relentless predator that adapts to your tactics.

Brave dynamic weather and unpredictable monster behaviours.

Progress through the Rift with Banjo’s objectives to unlock new timelines.

New maps and monsters will be added throughout Early Access.

Follow Macabre for updates: https://www.macabregame.com/socials
title: Macabre - Official Launch Trailer

We kick things off with a boss battle featuring the The Tiger of Kai, Takeda Shingen, which you can watch above.

#IGN #Nioh3

author: IGN
description:
20 years after cameras first rolled at Dunder Mifflin, The Office has spun off into The Paper, tailing accountant Oscar Martinez to his new gig at a different paper company, one with an actual newspaper. Creator Greg Daniels has built another show in the mold he helped perfect with both The Office and Parks and Recreation, and while The Paper is playing the hits, and playing them extremely well, the tempo might be a little too fast.

For more TV reviews check out what we thought of Alien: Earth and Peacemaker Season 2!

#ign
title: Review: The Paper: Full Season

author: IGN
description: Cronos: The New Dawn is a pulse-pounding, third-person survival horror game that throws you into the heart of a deadly struggle against overwhelming foes, all while uncovering the mysteries of a twisted time travel story. Its pretty spooky, which is fitting for the season. Check out 24 minutes of PC gameplay running at the highest possible graphical settings in 4k via an RTX 5090 GPU.
title: Cronos: The New Dawn - The First 24 Minutes of 4K RTX 5090 Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Cronos: The New Dawn reviewed by Tristan Ogilvie on PlayStation 5. Also available on Xbox Series X|S, PC, macOS, and Nintendo Switch 2. 

"Cronos: The New Dawn presents an intriguing mystery to unravel and a creepy sci-fi hellscape to explore, but its run-of-the-mill combat system prevents it from stepping out of the shadows cast by survival-horror heavyweights like Dead Space and Resident Evil 4. Its oppressively bleak environments are rich with interesting details to pore over, and a handful of its boss fights provoke a level of desperation that make them genuinely thrilling to survive, but elsewhere there’s clear padding that trips up the story’s momentum for considerable stretches at a time, and its predictable shock tactics are a step down from Silent Hill 2’s genuine scares. Like a Traveler’s corpse that’s trapped inside a temporal apocalypse, Cronos: The New Dawn contains the essence of survival horror, but there’s not quite enough spark in it to really bring it to life."
title: Cronos: The New Dawn Review

author: IGN
description:
Cronos: The New Dawn throws you into a brutal post-apocalyptic wasteland full of deadly creatures, scarce resources, and tough choices. To help you survive, we’ve put together 12 essential tips covering exploration, upgrades, combat, and resource management. Whether you’re just starting out or looking to sharpen your strategy, these tips will help you endure the horrors of New Dawn and uncover the secrets of the Change.

00:00 Intro  
00:28 Explore Every Corner  
00:55 Don’t Stress Over Locked Doors  
01:17 Pet Cats for Rewards  
01:37 Use Stash Boxes Wisely  
02:03 Upgrade Your Clip Size  
02:15 Prioritize Resource Limit Upgrades  
02:54 Use Torch Fuel Strategically  
03:29 Prioritize Charged Shots  
04:04 Utilize Essences at Your Own Risk  
04:43 Pay Attention to Documents and Travelogs  
05:15 Run, Don’t Fight  
05:44 Reuse Energy
title: Cronos: The New Dawn Survival Guide – 12 Tips You NEED to Know

author: IGN
description:
Even greater changes are still to come. Check out the 28 Years Later: The Bone Temple trailer for the upcoming horror film starring Ralph Fiennes, Jack O'Connell, Alfie Williams, Erin Kellyman, and Chi Lewis-Parry.

Expanding upon the world created by Danny Boyle and Alex Garland in 28 Years Later - but turning that world on its head - Nia DaCosta directs 28 Years Later: The Bone Temple. In a continuation of the epic story, Dr. Kelson (Ralph Fiennes) finds himself in a shocking new relationship - with consequences that could change the world as they know it - and Spike's (Alfie Williams) encounter with Jimmy Crystal (Jack O'Connell) becomes a nightmare he can't escape. In the world of The Bone Temple, the infected are no longer the greatest threat to survival - the inhumanity of the survivors can be stranger and more terrifying.

28 Years Later: The Bone Temple is produced by Andrew Macdonald, ​​​​​Peter Rice, ​​​​​Bernard Bellew, Danny Boyle, and Alex Garland. Cillian Murphy serves a
title: 28 Years Later: The Bone Temple - Official Trailer (2026) Ralph Fiennes, Jack O'Connell,

author: IGN
description:
Get a new look at Onirism, a colorful, kid-friendly action-adventure with some serious third-person shooter chops, ahead of its 1.0 version launch on September 25 after six years in Early Access. BunBun must be rescued!

Onirism's voice cast includes award-winning K-pop sensation and recently Billboard-chart topping artist AleXa (voicing protagonist Carol in the English version of Onirism), and Anna Lauzeray-Gishi, who played Kiriko in Overwatch (and voices Carol in the French version). In addition, the developer notes, "YouTube personalities Benzaie and Bob Lennon lend their voices to key characters, bringing fan-favorite energy and charisma to the Onirism universe."

Wishlist Onirism on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1057640/Onirism/
title: Onirism - Official 1.0 Version Launch Trailer

Check out the Bugonia trailer for this upcoming film directed by Yorgos Lanthimos. Bugonia stars Emma Stone, Jesse Plemons, Aidan Delbis, Stavros Halkias, and Alicia Silverstone.

Bugonia is produced by Ed Guiney, Andrew Lowe, Yorgos Lanthimos, Emma Stone, Ari Aster, Lars Knudsen, Miky Lee, and Jerry Kyoungboum Ko. The screenplay is by Will Tracy.

Bugonia opens in theaters on October 24, 2025.
title: BUGONIA - Official Trailer (2025) Emma Stone, Jesse Plemons

author: IGN
description:
The teaser trailer for the anime adaptation of KILL BLUE is finally here! A legendary hitman, at the age of 39 is starting over… in middle school.

Jūzō Ōgami is a legendary hitman who has never failed an assignment, no matter how impossible. One day, after wiping out a powerful organization, he is stung by a mysterious wasp and collapses. When he wakes up, the fearsome 39-year-old assassin has been transformed into a 13-year-old boy! Before he can even process what happened, his boss delivers a new order: “In that body, infiltrate a middle school.” What awaits him is an unexpected school life filled with colorful classmates, youthful chaos, and looming danger. Can Jūzō ever return to his original form? Or will the assassins closing in on him end his second life before it even begins!?

#IGN #Anime
title: KILL BLUE – Official Teaser Trailer (2026)
